category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0DefaultValidationMode
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default mode used to validate the configuration expression in the configuration view of the Product Configurator application. This validation mode is only for "Manual" mode in the configuration view. The Valid Values: - Overlay: allows users to select explicitly or to imply more than one feature of the family. This is the default value. - Order: forces users to explicitly select or to imply no more than a single feature of the family.
